metadata.title: Norelco 7886XL Quadra Action Dry Razor Shaver Corded Cordless, 7886 XL Brand new
features: Patented Lift and Cut technology, with 45 lifters and 45 rotating blades shave hair below skin level
Self-sharpening blades extend the life of razor heads.
LCD display shows remaining shaving time, battery level and signals when razor needs charging
60-day, full-refund satisfaction-guarantee; 2 year warranty against defects
description: Norelco's Quadra Action Shaving System. Two Stage Cutting Action, slots cut the long hairs, holes shave the stubble for a closer, more comfortable shave, rinses clean under tap!
